snippet.title: Roboquest - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Hey Guardians!

Roboquest will officially launch the 7th of November 2023!

The long awaited day is closer than ever. We can't tell you how impatient we are to finally be able to share the full version of the game with you. It was a very long journey (and probably a long wait for some of you who accompanied us through the Early Access).

You can already wishlist the game on Steam (https://store.steampowered.com/app/692890/Roboquest/) and you may want to join the conversation with us and other players on Discord (discord.gg/Roboquest).

Meanwhile, we wish you the best robot smashing everyone!

Social Links
X (Twitter) - https://twitter.com/RoboquestGame
TikTok - https://www.tiktok.com/@roboquestgame
Wishlist on Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/692890/Roboquest/
Join the community on Discord - discord.gg/Roboquest
